name: International Congress on Environmental Science & Engineering
content: We are delighted to announce and honored to invite you to the International Congress on Environmental Science & Engineering (EUROESE2025) on March 17-19, 2025 in Berlin, Germany. The EUROESE2025 aim is to become the most prestigious forum for the exchange of new ideas, technologies, and novel findings in a broad spectrum of scales ranging from the as well as in basic research and applications.
